KnowledgeItem.Title: ZooKeeperWorkflowHandlePKG
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for installing and starting the zookeeper by writing into the MARS model and creating new corresponding DataBlocks in the Issue.

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock ZooKeeperWorkflowHandlePKG and triggers the workflow for successful completion.

Activate.XMLExtract:
<NewBlock><Tasks
		       TargetMachine=${ZKWHP:TargetMachine}      
			   TargetState=Created
			   User=${ZKWHP:User}
			   Lib=PKG
			   PKG=zookeeper
			   Host=${ZKWHP:Host}
			   CurrentState=ReadState
			   TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
			 /> </NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks
		       TargetMachine=${ZKWHP:TargetMachine}      
			   TargetState=Created
			   User=${ZKWHP:User}
			   Lib=RUNCOMMAND
			   Host=${ZKWHP:Host}
			   CurrentState=ReadState
			   Command='sudo /usr/share/zookeeper/bin/zkServer.sh start'
			   TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
			 /> </NewBlock>
